description: A smaller dragon native to the frozen tundras, the Arctic Winds Drake is known for its speed and icy breath. Despite its size, it is a formidable predator, using the harsh winds to its advantage.

traits.name: Ice Glide
traits.description: The drake can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesnâ€™t cost it extra movement.

traits.name: Snow Camouflage
traits.description: The drake has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Icy Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The drake exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
